Text: RE Guaranty to be issuedI would have expected you to have received delivery by now I am faxing you a copy and will check with FedEx on the delivery status Thanks Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax PatriceLMims enroncom To cc Subject RE Guaranty to be issued PM Hey Rob I havent heard or seen anything yet on the executed contract Is everything okay Ill be out of the office traveling next week and I wanted to get a status before I left Thanks Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRobESmithdynegyEcom NRONcom Sent Wednesday September PM To Mims Patrice L Subject Guaranty to be issued Patrice I will be having this signed and sent to you tomorrow morning As we have gone back and forth a few times please let me know if you see anything that does not reflect our final determinations I have included both the redline and the final versions Thanks Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax See attached file EnronFinaldocSee attached file EnronRedlinedoc EnronFinaldoc File EnronFinaldoc EnronRedlinedoc File EnronRedlinedoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Guaranty to be issuedPatrice I will be having this signed and sent to you tomorrow morning As we have gone back and forth a few times please let me know if you see anything that does not reflect our final determinations I have included both the redline and the final versions Thanks Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax See attached file EnronFinaldocSee attached file EnronRedlinedoc EnronFinaldoc EnronRedlinedoc

Missing DatePatrice Please email or call me with that date I tried to call you backbut they put me on hold for several minutes Thanks Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax

RE Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental GuaranteePatrice Please see the below comments from my attorney Let me know if we can work with this Thanks I suggest revising that sentence as follows to avoid any potential conflict within the terms of the Guaranty itself and to accommodate Enrons reasonable request for a specific number of days and shall be deemed sufficient notice that subject to Paragraph of this Guaranty Guarantor agrees to pay the Obligations within business days after receiving the Payment Demand Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax PatriceLMims enroncom To cc Subject RE Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental Guarantee AM Hey Rob We have one more comment for you to consider We must have a definitive number of days in case Enron makes a demand on this guaranty We cannot leave the contract silent on that issue How about making it days instead of days Our lawyers say that we must have a definitive number of days Your turn Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRobESmithdynegyEcom NRONcom Sent Monday September PM To Mims Patrice L Subject Re Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental Guarantee Patrice Please let me know this is workable and I will get this issued ASAP Thanks Rob Smith RetailAlliance Credit Manager Louisiana Street Suite Houston TX Phone Fax Forwarded by Rob SmithHOUDynegy on PM Ernie Kohnke To Rob ynegy cc PM Subject Re Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental GuaranteeDocument link Rob Smith Rob I have made a few changes and one correction I deleted the reference to must pay within business days added to paragraph If Enron does make a demand under this guaranty there is no way we can make payment within those days especially since we will need to rely on an outside party to provide data to us As you know however when we receive a demand under a guaranty we move quickly to verify the request and make payments where appropriate I completed the information in paragraph a I deleted the second copy of the reps and warranties of corporate authority Finally I reinserted excluding choice of law provisions language to try to keep the case under Texas law assuming a dispute ever arises All told most of the changes look fine Thanks Ernie See attached file Dyn to Enron doc Rob Smith To Ernie ynegy cc Thomas ynegy AM Subject Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental Guarantee Forwarded by Rob SmithHOUDynegy on AM Mims Patrice L To PatriceLMims cc enroncom Subject Enrons Proposed Modifications for Parental Guarantee AM This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you See attached file Dynegy HOldings Parent Guaranty Dyn to Enron doc File Dyn to Enron doc Dynegy HOldings Parent Guaranty File Dynegy HOldings Parent Guaranty
